Project.Brief history of your project and organi: This dataset contains historical and projected dynamically downscaled climate data for the State of Alaska and surrounding regions at 20km spatial resolution and hourly temporal resolution. Select variables are also summarized into daily resolutions. This data was produced using the Weather Research and Forecasting (WRF) model (Version 3.5). We downscaled both ERA-Interim historical reanalysis data (1979-2015) and both historical and projected runs from 2 GCMâ€™s from the Coupled Model Inter-comparison Project 5 (CMIP5): GFDL-CM3 and NCAR-CCSM4 (historical run: 1970-2005 and RCP 8.5: 2006-2100). Note - this dataset was updated in August, 2023 to retain the latitude and longitude grids as variables in the files.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, North America, Europe, South America
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: HTTP or FTP server, Cloud storage (i.e. S3)
